Class ReseptiDAO

    • model.ReseptiDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReseptiDAO

    public class ReseptiDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements IReseptiDAO
    The class with all the methods for accessing the Resepti table in the database.
